QuestData.Title: Rumors of Mechagon
QuestData.Description:
I knew I should've taken that gig with the Greasemonkeys...
Gazlowe's crew always get paid, and no dumb risks. I heard they got somethin' big comin' up too...
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Gazlowe outside the Great Seal in Dazar'alor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Gazlowe outside the Great Seal in Dazar'alor.
